entry.source: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,19}{F87B,19,7,1,1}{F813,0,261002}Seems you've been to Ichigaya. We heard{F801}all about it already.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,261003}Hard to miss a pillar of light in the{F801}sky and those demons pouring in... You{F801}opened the gate to the Expanse, huh?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,19}{F87B,19,7,1,1}{F813,0,261002}Seems you've been to Ichigaya. We heard{F801}all about it already.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,261003}Hard to miss a pillar of light in the{F801}sky and those demons pouring in... You{F801}opened the gate to the Expanse, huh?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F87B,18,1,1,1}{F813,0,261004}It's true that with all those demons'{F801}power, it'll be easier for us to get{F801}to the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,261005}With muscle like that, we can make it{F801}even if the angels show up.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F87B,18,1,1,1}{F813,0,261004}It's true that with all those demons'{F801}power, it'll be easier for us to get{F801}to the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,261005}With muscle like that, we can make it{F801}even if the angels show up.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F87B,18,3,1,1}{F813,0,261006}But that'd mean bringing demons along{F801}with us to Mikado...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F87B,18,3,1,1}{F813,0,261006}But that'd mean bringing demons along{F801}with us to Mikado...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,19}{F87B,19,7,1,1}{F813,0,261007}And then we'd be no better off than{F801}we are here in Tokyo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,261008}Looks like we'll be fighting demons{F801}'til the day we die...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,19}{F87B,19,7,1,1}{F813,0,261007}And then we'd be no better off than{F801}we are here in Tokyo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,261008}Looks like we'll be fighting demons{F801}'til the day we die...{F801}
